title: Tarragon and Lemon Aioli Recipe
full_text:
Tarragon and Lemon Aioli Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Total
5 mins
Serves
8
to 12 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
recipe
two-minute aioli
2
tablespoons
minced
fresh tarragon leaves
1
teaspoon
zest
and
1
teaspoon
juice
from
1
lemon
Directions
Combine aioli, tarragon, and lemon zest and juice in a small bowl and stir until roughly combined. Drizzle with olive oil and serve with grilled vegetables, meats, or sandwiches. Aioli can be stored in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
